stages.title: STEP 0 Context
stages.prompt: Define goal, scope, risks, and feature flags before any code change.

stages.title: STEP 1 Read
stages.prompt: Read AGENTS.md and task-relevant files, then summarize only facts used by this task.

stages.title: STEP 2 Plan
stages.prompt: Break implementation into rollback-safe small steps and include verification command for each step.

stages.title: STEP 3 Change
stages.prompt: Apply minimal step-1 change first. Keep no-crash handling and feature flags default OFF.

stages.title: STEP 4 Verify
stages.prompt: Run lint/test and contract or smoke checks when API or runtime behavior changes.

stages.title: STEP 5 Rollback
stages.prompt: Document exact rollback command and verify feature-off path does not trigger heavy work.

stages.title: STEP 6 Observability
stages.prompt: List metrics/logs/alerts. Include tenant_id and trace_id where applicable.
